lines.text: What d'you got in there?

Uh, one bottle of a hundred and fifty proof rum, birth control pills, some Midol, my father's American Express card, king sized bottle of Alka-Seltzer 2, one sexy black teddy, a lid o' grass, and a... quarter, just in case I have to call home. I think that oughta get me through the night.
That could get me through the rest of my life.
Jennie, thinking has nothing to do with it. We're talking ten days of Sodom and Gomorrah. How can you duck out of that now?
Because I have a term paper due in two weeks and I haven't even started yet. I'm not like you Laurie. You don't crack a book and you make straight As.
It's a supermarket of sex!

[immediately after sex]
Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh yeah. Oh. Oh, that was so good. Mmm. Almost five years 'n' it just keeps getting better, you know, Carole? Carole?
I think we need separate vacations.
What? You've been talking to those girlfriends of yours, haven't you?
No. I've got a mind of my own.
What about the ski trip? I mean, we've been planning it all semester!
I know, but I really think that separate vacations would strengthen our relationship.
And just where are you planning on spending your separate vacation of yours?
Fort Lauderdale.
Fort Lauderdale?
Sandra, we're going to Fort Lauderdale for ten days. All you need is a bikini, and a diaphram.
S.A. *Major* S.A.
What's an "S.A."?
Stud Alert, you nun. I'm givin' that guy a ride.

[looking at Conan's penis]
Yeah? So where's the rest of it? I'll see *you* in small claims court.
Fort Lauderdale is a zoo. It's full o' millions of guys who are just lookin' for animal sex and debauchery.
Exactly, that's *why* we're going.
Oh my God, look at the talent on this girl. I mean... fuckin' incredible footage. Spielberg would shit.
Hot nights are callin' my name now, oh, oh, oh. / There's no lookin' back again, we're gone. / Can't wait forever, it's now or never. We're gone, gone, gone, gone.
Ooh, Oberlin, huh?
That's right.
Where the men are men, and the sheep are nervous? Can we get acquainted?
First my party's ruined, then my house is destroyed. Now someone's stolen my car.
As I've always said, Barbara, you throw one hell of a party.
Hi y'all. I'm from Texas A and M.
Looks more like Texas *S* and M.
Attention, attention! This is Mr. Bullhorn! Don't miss the Bootlegger Hot Bod Contest! The bigger the boobs, the bigger the bucks!

[looking at Carole's chest and smiling]
Hello...
Oh, forget it!
Come on, Carole!

[to Jeff]
Jeff! You're in the Hot Bod contest with Carole. I want you firm, and I want you pumped.
Right, buddy.
C'mon, why does it have to be me? This is really embarrassing!

[encouragingly]
No, it isn't, it would be so much fun, and besides, you've had years of dance lessons.

[looking disgusted]
Jennie, that was ballet. I don't think the Hot Bod is looking for a new Giselle.
Hey! You know, that guy's kinda cute. He's got gorgeous eyes and a nice smile. Pretty intelligent too!
Yeah! And how about those buns?
I'm gonna take that yellow shirt, blue visor and the guy who's in it.
I want to go so bad! I just have so much work to do.
You'll bring your books, and you'll study.
When you're not lusting after Camden.
You can do both.
You're right. I can do both.
So?
We're outta here!

[When Sandra and Laurie are in jail, and Sandra discovered that her jewelry is missing when she puts her right hand over her heart]
They took all my jewelry. They actually took my mugshot without any jewelry on.
[Places her right hand on top of her forehead]
You know my mother will have a total conniption fit if she knows I'm here.
Um-hmm.

[Sandra snaps of it and finds that they're in jail]
What are we doing here?
You don't remember?
[Sandra nervously shakes her head]
The striptease? The accident?
No.

[Laurie smiles at Sandra]
And telling Officer Gasso... to 'fuck off'?

[Sandra is appalled]
Laurie, I did... a striptease, and told a police officer... to screw off?

[Laurie corrects Sandra]
"Fuck... off".

[Sandra is stunned!]
Oh my God... what are we gonna do?
[Place her right hand over her forehead]
Ow!
Don't worry about it. I called Jennie. She knows we're here and get us out.

[responding to a knock at the door]
Hey, if you're young, hot, and hung you can come in.
